title: Ebro In The Morning - Megan Thee Stallion Speaks On Tory Lanez Shooting + Ebro Addresses Taxstone
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 4/25/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio on Monday explaining why DaBaby, Taxstone, and Ben Simmons played themselves.

Get excited for the gurus to help solve your problems and get the latest news with Flashing Lights. All that and more on Ebro In The Morning!
